None.Name: Blessed Partisans
None.Description: Active to make unit deal 30% more damage against close-combat opponents.It will then deal 30% less damage against ranged enemies ,though. Attacked targets can only move at walk speed for 10s. Last until deactivated.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.
